languages.text: "Даргонус — сердце и душа вашего протектората. Здесь расположены основные административные ресурсы, хранилища, а также, если вам интересно, семейный дворец, в котором вам предстоит публично принять титул Вольного Торговца. Даргонус — административный узел, который обеспечивает работу грузового флота и ведет учет финансов".

traits.locale_text: "Даргонус — сердце и душа вашей империи. Здесь расположены основные административные ресурсы, хранилища, а также, если вам интересно, огромный дворец, в котором вам предстоит публично принять титул Вольного Торговца. Только не думайте, что это просто церемониальная планетка с кучкой бюрократов, решающих проблемы вашей империи! Даргонус — отражение ваших качеств и деяний как Вольного Торговца. Обертка, по которой вас будут судить незнакомцы и подданные. Поэтому мой вам совет: не относитесь к столице слишком уж пренебрежительно".

languages.text: "Dargonus is the heart and soul of your protectorate. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."
languages.original_text: "Даргонус — сердце и душа вашего протектората. Здесь расположены основные административные ресурсы, хранилища, а также, если вам интересно, семейный дворец, в котором вам предстоит публично принять титул Вольного Торговца. Даргонус — административный узел, который обеспечивает работу грузового флота и ведет учет финансов".

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus is the heart and soul of your entire empire. This is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the family palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publically accept the title of the Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

"Dargonus is the heart and soul of your empire. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

"Dargonus is the heart and soul of your empire. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

"Dargonus is the heart and soul of your protectorate. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

languages.text: «Dargonus es el corazón y el alma de su protectorado. Aloja los principales recursos administrativos y las instalaciones de almacenamiento, así como el palacio von Valancius. Si le interesa saberlo, es aquí donde aceptará el cargo de Comerciante Independiente de forma pública. Dargonus es un nexo administrativo esencial desde el que se dirige la flota de mercancías y se controlan las finanzas».
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is the heart and soul of your protectorate. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

traits.locale_text: «Dargonus es el corazón y el alma de su protectorado. Aloja los principales recursos administrativos y las instalaciones de almacenamiento, así como el palacio von Valancius. Si le interesa saberlo, es aquí donde aceptará el cargo de Comerciante Independiente de forma pública. Dargonus es un nexo administrativo esencial desde el que se dirige la flota de mercancías y se controlan las finanzas».

languages.text: “达戈努斯是您的王朝的核心与灵魂所在。您所有的主要行政资源与储存设施都在那颗行星上，包括冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的宫殿。至于其他的嘛，您也会在那颗行星上正式继承行商浪人这个称号。达戈努斯是您主要的行政中心，负责管理您的货运舰队，追踪您的财务状况。”
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is the heart and soul of your protectorate. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯是您的王朝的核心与灵魂所在。您所有的主要行政资源与储存设施都在那颗行星上，包括冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的宫殿。至于其他的嘛，您也会在那颗行星上正式继承行商浪人这个称号。达戈努斯是您主要的行政中心，负责管理您的货运舰队，追踪您的财务状况。”

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスは保護領の心臓であり魂です。ここには主な行政資源と保管施設があり、フォン・ヴァランシウス宮殿もここにあります。ああ、それから、自由開拓者の称号を公式に受けることができるのもこちらです。ダルゴナスは主要な行政拠点で、貨物船の運行と財務状況の記録をしています」
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is the heart and soul of your protectorate. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスは保護領の心臓であり魂です。ここには主な行政資源と保管施設があり、フォン・ヴァランシウス宮殿もここにあります。ああ、それから、自由開拓者の称号を公式に受けることができるのもこちらです。ダルゴナスは主要な行政拠点で、貨物船の運行と財務状況の記録をしています」

languages.text: "Dargonus ist Herz und Seele Eures Protektorats. Dort befinden sich die zentralen Verwaltungsressourcen und Lager sowie der Palast von Valancius. Falls es Euch interessiert, dort werdet Ihr auch öffentlich den Titel {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} annehmen. Dargonus ist ein Verwaltungszentrum für die Frachtflotte und die Finanzen."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is the heart and soul of your protectorate. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus ist Herz und Seele Eures Protektorats. Dort befinden sich die zentralen Verwaltungsressourcen und Lager sowie der Palast von Valancius. Falls es Euch interessiert, dort werdet Ihr auch öffentlich den Titel {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} annehmen. Dargonus ist ein Verwaltungszentrum für die Frachtflotte und die Finanzen."

languages.text: « Dargonus est le cœur et l'âme de votre protectorat. C'est là que se trouvent les principaux services administratifs et entrepôts, de même que le palais des von Valancius. Si cela vous intéresse, c'est également sur cette planète vous accepterez officiellement le titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Dargonus est un centre administratif majeur qui dirige la flotte commerciale et gère les finances. »
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is the heart and soul of your protectorate. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

traits.locale_text: « Dargonus est le cœur et l'âme de votre protectorat. C'est là que se trouvent les principaux services administratifs et entrepôts, de même que le palais des von Valancius. Si cela vous intéresse, c'est également sur cette planète vous accepterez officiellement le titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Dargonus est un centre administratif majeur qui dirige la flotte commerciale et gère les finances. »

languages.text: "Dargonus, protektoranızın kalbi ve ruhudur. Ana idare kaynaklarının ve depolama tesislerinin, aynı şekilde von Valancius sarayının da bulunduğu yerdir. Belki bilmek istersiniz, Hür Tacir ünvanını alenen orada kabul edeceksiniz. Dargonus, nakliye filolarının yönetildiği, finansal varlıkların koordine edildiği büyük bir idare merkezidir."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus is the heart and soul of your protectorate. It is where the main administrative resources and storage facilities are, and so is the von Valancius palace. If you would like to know, this is where you will publicly accept the title of Rogue Trader. Dargonus is a major administrative hub that runs the cargo fleet and keeps track of finances."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus, protektoranızın merkezidir. Ana yönetim kaynaklarının ve depolama tesislerinin bulunduğu yerdir. Von Valancius sarayının da aynı zamanda. Belki bilmek istersiniz: Hür Tacir ünvanını resmi olarak kabul edeceğiniz yer burası. Dargonus, nakliye filolarının düzenlendiği ve finansal varlıkların koordine edildiği bir ana yönetim merkezidir."
